feed.title: Hayday - News
feed.subtitle: RSS wrapper of Hayday inbox News

entry.title: Hay Day Events Week 31!
entry.content:
Hay Day Events Week 31

Hello farmers! It's time for another week full of Events! All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Vouchers)

Tuesday: Town Visitors (2x XP) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Wednesday: Boat Event (Boosters) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Thursday: Production Building Event (3 random buildings, 20% boost) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30%) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (2x XP) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Sunday: Crop Boost Event (3 Crops instead of 2, 3 random crops)

Have a great week!

entry.title: Visitor Milestone Info
entry.content:
Green Game Jam Visitor Milestone

In Hay Day, nothing bad ever happens and every meal is a sustainable meal! We are joining Green Game Jam and inviting you to bring some of that sustainability to your real lives and share it with your loved ones.

Right now, our Farm Visitors are giving out extra Coins for all the vegetarian goodies you produce during the Task Event - and we're ready to give you even more rewards!

For the next 7 days, let's come together as a community to serve as many Farm Visitors as we can, earning extra rewards along the way.

Rewards:

  • 20 Million Farm Visitors Served: 2x Screws

  • 40 Million Farm Visitors Served: 2x Marker Stakes

  • 60 Million Farm Visitors Served: 10x Diamonds

  • 80 Million Farm Visitors Served: 1x Pumpkin Gnome

Keep an eye on your inbox to track our progress towards this milestone, and when it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the Shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

Together, we can create a positive impact! Good luck!

entry.title: Release Notes Autumn Update 2024
entry.content:
Get ready for a new update with lots of content and features!

NEW FEATURES

Scenic Mode

The new Scenic Mode hides all on-screen buttons and icons, so you can fully enjoy your designs and capture stunning screenshots. You can find it in the settings menu, right next to the Edit Mode button.

Edit Mode Improvements

Watch the latest Dairy News to get a full understanding of how everything works. If English isn't your first language, be sure to turn on the captions. Here's a summary:

  • You can now enjoy the same search and filter options in Edit Mode that youâ€™re familiar with in the Deco Shop.

  • Weâ€™ve removed the sliding animation when using the brush option, making it easier to place multiple items without the shop shifting every time.Â 

  • Removing items is now as simple as a swipe. However, while in eraser mode, you wonâ€™t be able to move the map, so you will need to turn it off when you want to navigate around.Â If you remove something by mistake, you can use the Undo button.

  • Now, when you place decorations from the shop, theyâ€™ll stay exactly where you put them, even in the red zone.Â If you change your mind, simply tap outside to return the decoration to its original place or in the shop.

NEW CONTENT

Treats Maker Event

One day after the update, Alfred will deliver a new temporary production building to your farm: the Halloween Treats Maker.Â 

Start producing Halloween treats, then ship them off on boat orders to receive the temporary currency, which will help you unlock new items and new thematic Halloween decorations from the catalog.Â 

Donâ€™t forget, earning mastery stars for your Halloween Treats Maker will help boost your treats production!

Ingredients

  • Teeth Treats: 3x SugarCrane, 3x Carrots, 1x Egg

  • Worm Treats: 1x Apple, 1x Popcorn, 3x Indigo

  • Skull Treats: 1x Blue Sweater, 5x Chilli Pepper, 2x Brown Sugar

  • Pumpkin Treats: 1x Potato Bread, 1x Honey, 3x Pumpkin

Halloween Decorations

These are some of the new decorations you will see throughout this month! And you can expect 2 decoration collections rewarding you for completing them.

Sanctuary Animals

Two new baby ostriches are joining the Sanctuary family! You can unlock them with puzzle pieces once you've opened up the Sanctuary space in your Town area.

IMPROVEMENTS

Puzzle Pieces

Weâ€™ve added a change that introduces fallback rewards for puzzle pieces.

This means that if you've already collected all the animals in your sanctuary book, you wonâ€™t see puzzle pieces as rewards anymore.

Testing New Changes

We have made a few more changes that we will be testing with a small group of players first, to ensure they enhance your overall farming experience.Â 

You might not notice these updates right away, but if everything goes smoothly, theyâ€™ll be available to everyone in the next few weeks.

One of the new changes is that you will soon be able to send multiple truck orders without waiting for the truck to return.Â Simply reopen the order board after the truck has left, complete another order, and it will come back with all your rewards!

Other Fixes:

  • You can now instantly free up the lobster pool and duck salon without having to wait for the animation to finish.

  • Weâ€™ve resolved the issue where you had to wait for the animation to complete before filling the next boat crate.

  • Fixed the flickering issue on the Derby screen.

  • Plus, many more improvements to enhance your Hay Day experience!

Thank you for playing and see you on the farm!

entry.title: October Events Calendar
entry.content:
Get ready for the new events coming your way this October!

02.10 - 31.10 - Halloween Catalog Event (New Currency: Halloween Hats)

02.10 - 07.10 - Task Event

04.10 - 24.10 - Chicken Valley

08.10 - 31.10 - Halloween Temporary Building + Boat Event (Take part in this event to collect even more Halloween Hats for your Catalog)

08.10 - 31.10 - New Halloween Decoration Collection

14.10 - 25.10 - Halloween Greg's Calendar Event

17.10 - 21.10 - Global Boat Event

entry.title: Halloween Milestone Info
entry.content:
We are giving away 1 MILLION COINS to 20 lucky farmers and the Ghost Pig decoration to the entire community!

We have prepared a new community milestone to celebrate Halloween! Your mission? Fill up the tracking bar by producing treats with the new Halloween Treats Maker delivered by Alfred, then shipping them off in boat orders to earn the new currency: Halloween Hats.

The goal for all of you is to reach as many Halloween Hats as possible together as a community.Â 

These are the milestones:

1 billion Halloween Hats - 100 x Halloween Hats

2 billion Halloween Hats -Â 15 x Diamonds

3 billion Halloween Hats - 250 Halloween HatsÂ 

4 billion Halloween Hats - 1 x Ghost Pig

And donâ€™t worry, spending the currency in the catalog wonâ€™t affect your progress.

But that's not even the best part: 20 players who participate in the event will receive 1 MILLION COINS.Â 

We will randomly select five players for every milestone the community reaches and send them the 1 million coins!Â  Everyone has an equal chance of becoming one of the winners.

When it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

The community event will last for ten days, and it starts now!
